message: Let's make a deal! I take $70, you take $30. A fair offer considering the inflation.
I think a 60/40 split is fairer, considering the inflation we both face. It allows us both to gain something, and it's a more balanced deal.
Bob, this is the best you're going to get.  My offer from Round 1 is worth less to me now, and the value will only keep dropping.  Take the $40 before it shrinks even more.
